Holiday Tickets are now on Sale! These usually sell out a month before the ride.

Friday Group Train Ride, August 9, 10:30 AM – Cancelled due to weather, refunds are complete

Wednesday Group Ride, August 14, 10:30 AM

Friday Group Train Ride, August 23, 10:30 AM – Added to replace August 9th cancelled event

The weekday rides are perfect for groups or individuals looking for a fun and educational activity during a week day morning. We offer a $1 discount per rider for groups of 12 or more using a special offer code for your discounts. Visit our Groups/Charters page for more information.

#309 Caboose is now Air Conditioned!

#309 is now air conditioned for the hot summer months ahead. Each Caboose supports 10 riders. If a caboose does not appear on the order page, it has already been booked by another passenger.

Birthday Party Caboose – Have your kid’s birthday party at New Hope Valley Railway!

Do your party for up to 12 children with room for adults in our restored, vintage and airconditioned caboose and then follow up with a train ride. The birthday child gets a free ride. For details, go to https://www.triangletrain.com/party-caboose

Operate a Locomotive

Come to our Operate a Loco events and learn to drive the diesel electric locomotives we use to pull excursion trains on our 4 miles of track. You will actually operate the locomotive with our certified Engineer at your side. There are 3 Seats available on August 10th. Click for OAL details or press Buy Tickets to purchase.

Slow down Sunday Ride

Visit North Carolina Railroad Museum / New Hope Valley Railway on Sunday August 11th and enjoy a nice Sunday ride through the woods of New Hill. For more information and to purchase tickets, go to www.triangletrain.com and press Buy Tickets. There are 4 rides that day and one of the cabooses on the train (#309) is air conditioned. We also have museum exhibits, a post office rail car and refurbished caboose. We have air conditioned restrooms and a rail themed gift shop to enjoy.

Launching of Adopt-A-Train program!

The North Carolina Railway Museum is delighted to announce that NOW you can adopt a train – locomotive, caboose, or railcar from our collection of heritage rolling stock! Your 12-month, symbolic adoption makes a great gift for your kids or love ones, memorial recognition, or business promotion at the same time that you are supporting our mission of preserving and sharing North Carolina railroad history for generations to come! For more information
